name: doctml
description: Generate DOCX documents using a simple HTML-like syntax with optional templating.
author: Dominik Kilian <kontakt@dominik.cc>

scripts.prebuild-cli: npx esbuild src/cli.ts --platform=node --format=cjs --bundle --sourcemap --target=node18 --metafile=dist/cli/doctml.json --outfile=dist/cli/doctml.cjs && npm run _lic -- dist/cli/license.txt dist/cli/doctml.json && npx tsx scripts/get-version.ts
scripts._lic: npx license-checker --json --out dist/licenses.json && npx tsx scripts/gen-licenses.ts dist/licenses.json
scripts.check: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx eslint src test
scripts._old-_lic: npx license-checker --json --out dist/licenses.json && npx ts-node --swc scripts/gen-licenses.ts dist/licenses.json
scripts._old-prebuild: npx esbuild src/xml2docx.ts --platform=node --format=cjs --bundle --sourcemap --target=node18 --metafile=dist/xml2docx.json --outfile=dist/xml2docx.cjs && npm run _lic -- dist/xml2docx-license.txt dist/xml2docx.json && node scripts/postprocess.cjs
scripts._old-postbuild-web: npm run _lic -- web/license.html dist/web-main.json dist/web-monaco.json dist/web-worker.json
scripts._old-check: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx eslint src
scripts._old-docs: npx ts-node --swc scripts/gen-docs.ts && npx ts-node --swc scripts/build-docs.ts
scripts._old-all: npm run check && npm run docs && npm run build && npm run test && npm run build-web
